import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import CardImage from '../../assets/images/card_background-01.png' import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { selectContent } from '../../state/contentSlice' import RoomInfo from '../../assets/contentFiles/Rooms' const BrowseChatRooms = () => { const content = useSelector(selectContent) return ( <>

Browse Popular Chatrooms

 {content.map(RoomInfo => (

{RoomInfo.title}

{RoomInfo.description}

))} ) } export default BrowseChatRooms;
